content:
# We have successfully gathered 10 iron ore. Our updated inventory now shows 7 wood, 15 stone, 10 iron ore, and 1 iron plate.

# Now, let's insert the 10 iron ore into the stone furnace to smelt them into iron plates.

insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, stone_furnace, quantity=10)  # Insert 10 iron ore into the furnace.
print(f"Furnace inventory after ore insertion: {inspect_inventory(stone_furnace)}")  # Check the furnace's inventory.
